kw.name: Set Selenium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout that is used by various keywords.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=employee_api, url=http://localhost:8081, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=True, debug=0

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Window Size
kw.doc: Sets current windows size to given ``width`` and ``height``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://localhost:8081/api/employees path_url=/api/employees headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.3', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate, zstd', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None

GET Response : url=http://localhost:8081/api/employees status=200, reason= headers={'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Transfer-Encoding': 'chunked', 'Date': 'Wed, 16 Apr 2025 05:37:59 GMT', 'Keep-Alive': 'timeout=60', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=[]

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Get Title
kw.doc: Returns the title of the current page.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'css:.navbar-brand' contains exact text 'Employee Management'.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'id:addEmployeeNav' contains exact text 'Add Employee'.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'id:employeeListNav' contains exact text 'Employee List'.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.
